Jack Dawson (Leonardo DiCaprio) is a young adventurer who, at the table, win a ticket to the first voyage of the ocean liner Titanic. It is a luxurious and stately ship, advertised at the time as unsinkable, departing for the United States. In it is also Rose DeWitt Bukater (Kate Winslet), a young bride Caledon Hockley (Billy Zane). Rose is unhappy with his life as it feels stifled by the mores of the elite and not love Caledon. However, she must marry him to keep the good name of the family who is bankrupt. One day, desperate, Rose threatens to shoot the Titanic, but Jack manages to dissuade her from the idea. By the act he is invited to dinner in the first class, which starts to become closer to Rose. Soon they fall in love, arousing the fury of Caledon. The situation becomes even more complicated when the Titanic collides with an iceberg, causing something no one thought possible: the sinking of the ship.
